Uses of Package
game

  • Packages that use game 
    Package Description
    game  
    rummy  
  • Classes in game used by game 
    Class Description
    Game
    A generic multi-player game, which may be sub-classed to implement a real game.
    GameAction
    An action for a generic game.
    GameMoveAction
    A GameMoveAction is an action that is a "move" in a game (as opposed to an administrative action, like "quit game").
    GamePlayer
    A player who plays a (generic) game.
    GameState
    A class that represents the state of a game (e.g., the positions of each piece on a checkerboard together with an indication of whose move it is).
    GameTimer
    A GameTimer is an object that sends a GameTimerAction to a Game at regular intervals.
    ProxyObject
    An object that communicates over the network with another object.
    ProxyPlayer
    A Player object that is a proxy for the real player, which is somewhere else on the network.
  • Classes in game used by rummy 
    Class Description
    Game
    A generic multi-player game, which may be sub-classed to implement a real game.
    GameAction
    An action for a generic game.
    GameComputerPlayer
    An abstract computerized game player.
    GameDriver
    An interface that creates game-specific players and options.
    GameGui
    This represents the game's graphical user interface.
    GameHumanPlayer  
    GameMoveAction
    A GameMoveAction is an action that is a "move" in a game (as opposed to an administrative action, like "quit game").
    GamePlayer
    A player who plays a (generic) game.
    GameState
    A class that represents the state of a game (e.g., the positions of each piece on a checkerboard together with an indication of whose move it is).
    ProxyPlayer
    A Player object that is a proxy for the real player, which is somewhere else on the network.
